job.title: Solution Architect
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description:
Must Have Active Security Clearance***
Our client is seeking a corporate Solution Architect to serve as the technical lead for carrying out solutioning activities in support of their business development.
The ideal candidate will be responsible for researching, identifying, and tailoring technical capabilities that will be integrated into proposals and pre-sales presentations.The Solution Architect will be responsible for coordinating with business development, IT leadership, and proposal leadership to identify technical resources required to support pre-proposal and proposal activities to include developing and/or contributing to basis of estimates, technical and staffing solutions, win themes, technical proposal writing, workflows, and graphics ideas.
Requirements:
Bachelor's Degree in Information Systems/technical discipline.
Ten years of federal IT experience with at least 5 years as a solutions architect.
ITIL background or experience working in an ITIL framework-based project
Required demonstrated experience providing innovative solutions in cloud, cybersecurity, DevOps, and IT services.
Proven track record of supporting the capture of new business and developing leading-edge technical solutions for potential and existing customers
Ability to analyze and understand business and technical requirements
Ability to develop and present technical proposals
Demonstrated leadership in leading and facilitating technical solutions
Experience in Enterprise IT environments including Public Cloud/FedRAMP Cloud platforms
Experience in Federal cybersecurity compliance and FISMA and NIST 800-53 security controls and requirements
Ability to design technical solutions for complex IT Services projects
Ability to create Basis of Estimates (BOEs to determine level of effort for technical and delivery activities)
AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Associate
Microsoft Certified: Azure Fundamentals
Required Experience
Preferred Experience/Capabilities:
Experience in DevOps environments or work within Agile frameworks
Previous experience leading or supporting large IT projects or programs
ITIL Practitioner certification
Active Security clearance
AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Professional
Microsoft Certified Azure Solutions Architect Expert
